paper_abstract: Most existing web search looks do not utilize previous search experiences of others to improve performance for the current use): In. this article, we present a collaborative web agent designed to enable across-user collaboration in web search and recommendation. We use our distributed collaborative fillering (CF) algorithm based on a P2P overlay network, of autonomous agents. Experiments show that OUT proposed scheme is more scalable than traditional centralized CF filtering systems and alleviates the sparsity problem in distributed CF.
paper_title: Collaborative web agent based on friend network
